setting.name: Unicode Normal Form
setting.description: The Unicode normalization form. Two are supported, NFD (Normal Form Decomposed) and NFC (Normal Form Composed). NFD is the default.

setting.name: Source File Name PrePart
setting.description: A prefix that is found on the begining of a text source file name.

setting.name: Source File Name Form ID
setting.description: An ID that maps to a description of a predeterminied form that the main part of the file name of the source file will take.

setting.name: Source File Name PostPart
setting.description: A sufix that is found on the end of a text source file name. Often just the file extention (with the dot/period character) but could contain other characters before the dot as well.

setting.name: ParaTExt Default Font
setting.description: If this project is connected to a ParaTExt project, record the default project font.
